data.title: College of Contemporary Music
data.meta_description: A contemporary music school dedicated to inspiring artistic & academic excellence while preparing students for careers in the music and entertainment industry.
data.text:
MUSICIANS INSTITUTE

A contemporary music school dedicated to

inspiring artistic & academic excellence.

APPLY NOWREQUEST INFO

VIRTUAL OPEN HOUSE

Find out for yourself why thousands of musicians from all over the world have made MI the launching pad for their careers.

FINANCING YOUR EDUCATION

You’ll learn about everything from an overview of the financial aid process, to key documents you’ll encounter, and different funding sources that can help you manage costs.

MI ONLINE INFO SESSION

Meet the MI Online team as they guide you through the MIO platform, the diverse program offerings, and the steps needed to apply.

Musicians Institute offers certificates and degrees in 16 music programs on-campus or online. Whether you want to study for 10 weeks or 4 years, it’s all here at MI!

i New MI Programs/Degrees

LIVE MUSIC EVENT PRODUCTION

The LMEP program is back on campus! Learn everything you need to know about live sound engineering and the behind-the-scenes industry skills needed to excel in the business.

MI ONLINE BACHELOR PROGRAMS

MI Online now offers 5 new Bachelor of Music degrees in Guitar, Drum, Vocal, Keyboard, and Bass!

i MI Success Stories

ANDERSON .PAAK /

8x Grammy Winner

DRUM PROGRAM

“My story as an artist has been about trial and error. It’s been about artist development, character building, struggle, happiness and failure, family, and music.”

Bishop Briggs / Singer/Songwriter

VOCAL PROGRAM

“I truly never saw myself doing anything other than music.”

Derek Keota / Best Engineered Album Grammy Nomination

AUDIO ENGINEERIG PROGRAM

“To say MI has been a life-changing experience would be an understatement.”

Nicole Row / Panic! At the Disco

BASS PROGRAM

“The most important thing I took from MI was what you do with what you’re given. I tried my best to absorb everything I heard, and took every gig I was offered.”

Keith Hetrick / Best R&B Album Grammy Nomination

KEYBOARD PROGRAM

“I think the most important things I took away from my time at MI were the relationships I made with other creatives; across all walks of life, and across all parts of the world.”

JUSTIN DERRICO /

Pink, NBC’s The Voice

GUITAR PROGRAM

“I definitely wouldn’t be where I am today if it weren’t for MI.”

i You’re in the Spotlight at MI

i You’re in the Spotlight

at MI

Musicians Institute offers a blend of unique personalized education and Hollywood music industry connections that you will not find anywhere else. At MI, your musical journey and progress always takes center stage.

HOLLYWOOD LOCATION

Our campus is located in the middle of the entertainment industry, including the worlds of music, film, television and beyond. Students will have access to the finest live music venues, along with opportunities and possibilities to visit, intern and work at the best studios and sought after music labels in the world.

PRIVATE LESSONS

MI Music Performance students are given one hour private lessons with their instructors every week and/or open counseling to strengthen their skills on a personalized scale. Music Production and Recording and Music Industry students also have project advising available, where instructors will critique and advise each student on their final project.

LIVE PERFORMANCE WORKSHOPS

As part of the curriculum, MI students perform weekly in Live Performance Workshops (LPWs). MI is unique in giving students a fully immersive stage experience as soon as they start their classes. The song selections are changed weekly, so students can gain experience with diverse genres, making them stronger musicians for their careers beyond MI.

CLINICS

Every quarter, students have access to attend free clinics and seminars from visiting musicians from around the world. The topics and genres presented by clinicians are diverse to allow students a well-rounded insight into the music industry and working professionals.

MENTORS/NETWORKING

MI students have direct, one-on-one access to successful industry professionals, who can offer personalized career advice on their progress and projects. The Artist & Career Services (ACS) team strives to continually grow and evolve our list of mentors, so students can always speak to professionals thriving in the current music industry today.

i MI Programs & Degrees

i MI Programs & Degrees

Musicians Institute offers a full range of degrees and a wide variety of areas of concentration in the field of contemporary music. Study music with some of the best working musicians in the world.

Musicians Institute offers a full range of degrees and a wide variety of areas of concentration in the field of contemporary music. Study music with some of the best working musicians in the world. Check out our programs to see why we’re one of the best music schools around.

MUSIC PERFORMANCE

Musicians Institute’s Music Performance Programs are a unique combination of contemporary music performance and rigorous education in traditional music disciplines. Performance programs in our music college include five major instruments of study:

Master of Music / Bachelor of Music / Associate of Arts / Certificate

BASS

DRUM

GUITAR

HORNS

KEYBOARD

VOCAL

CertificateSONGWRITING

MUSIC PRODUCTION & RECORDING

Musicians Institute’s production programs provide students with the educational foundation for careers as producers, audio engineers, beat makers, composers for visual media including film, television, animation and games. Our production programs include:

Bachelor of Music

MUSIC COMPOSITION

SONGWRITING & PRODUCTION

Associate of Science

STUDIO RECORDING

Certificate

ARTIST PRODUCER ENTREPRENEUR

AUDIO ENGINEERING

ELECTRONIC MUSIC PRODUCTION

INDEPENDENT ARTIST PROGRAM

MUSIC INDUSTRY

Musicians Institute’s Industry programs offer students the foundation for a successful career as a music business professional. From marketing, to royalties and music law, students will get an extensive education to help them navigate the full industry with ease.

Associate of Science / Certificate

MUSIC BUSINESS

Certificate

GUITAR CRAFT ACADEMY – NASHVILLE

ALTERNATIVE PROGRAMS

MI ACADEMY

The Musicians Institute Academy is a performance-based music education program designed to guide and inspire young people (and beyond) as they find their voices as musicians. The Saturday Academy classes were created to allow students to practice their passion at their own pace, where they will receive private lessons, open counseling, lessons in video techniques, branding, and more.

MI ACADEMY

SUMMER SHOT

MI’s Summer Shot experience is an interactive summer music program for musicians 12 and older. This immersive week-long program will pair students with award-winning instructors in performance or production-based programs, so they can get a taste of a future career in music and just have fun!

SUMMER SHOT

MI SELECT

MI Select are non-certificate programs designed to provide students with “a taste of MI” if they want another option to studying full-time.

MI SELECT

PRO TOOLS CERTIFICATION

The Avid Pro Tools® certification courses are non-accredited courses designed for those who wish to acquire their Avid User and/or Operator Certification through weekend classes at Musicians Institute in Hollywood, CA.

PRO TOOLS CERTIFICATION

UPCOMING EVENTS
